mapper.select: select * from show_sign order by signnum desc

select signpart, signfirst, signsecond from show_sign group by signpart, signfirst, signsecond
having signpart = #{part}
mapper.insert: insert into show_sign signnum , signpart , signfirst , signsecond , mednum values ( show_sign_seq.nextval , signpart , signfirst , signsecond , mednum )
